caption: This photograph features a vivid view of an industrial scene dominated by a wide, tumultuous river in the foreground and a large red-brick factory building in the background. The river has a brownish hue with a sizeable white and foamy waterfall close to the bottom of the frame, creating a dynamic and chaotic texture in the water. The building in the background is identified with a prominent signage bearing the name "Auerbach Shoe Company" spanning the width of the center portion on the roof. This building exhibits characteristics typical of early 20th-century industrial architecture, including uniform rows of windows and distinct segmented sections for different operational needs. The area immediately surrounding the factory appears lush with greenery, indicating a riverside location. The overcast sky suggests a gloomy or rainy day, contributing to the dark and moody atmosphere of the scene.
title: Androscoggin river falls viewed from the Brunswick-topsham bridge
